original_text: Saul came to the place near the road where the shepherds keep their sheep. There was a cave near to this place. Saul went in there to use it as a toilet.
korean_text: 길 가 양의 우리에 이른즉 굴이 있는지라 사울이 뒤를 보러 들어가니라 다윗과 그의 사람들이 그 굴 깊은 곳에 있더니

sentences.original_text: Saul came to the place near the road
sentences.korean_translation: 사울이 길 근처의 그 장소로 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: where the shepherds keep their sheep
There was a cave near to this place
to use it as a toilet
